TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemaphoreSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示对可同时访问资源或资源池的线程数加以限制的 的轻量替代。

span.span: Represents a lightweight alternative to that limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信号量分为两种类型: 本地信号量和命名系统信号量。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 前者在应用程序本地。The former is local to an app. 后者在整个操作系统中均可见, 适用于进程间同步。The latter is visible throughout the operating system and is suitable for inter-process synchronization. 是不使用 Windows 内核信号量的类的轻型替代项。 The is a lightweight alternative to the class that doesn't use Windows kernel semaphores. 与类不同 , 类不支持已命名的系统信号量。 Unlike the class, the class doesn't support named system semaphores. 只能将其用作本地信号量。You can use it as a local semaphore only. 类是用于在单个应用内进行同步的建议信号量。The class is the recommended semaphore for synchronization within a single app. 轻型信号灯控制对应用程序的本地资源池的访问。A lightweight semaphore controls access to a pool of resources that is local to your application. 实例化信号量时, 可以指定可同时进入信号量的最大线程数。When you instantiate a semaphore, you can specify the maximum number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 还可以指定可同时进入信号量的初始线程数。You also specify the initial number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 这会定义信号量的计数。This defines the semaphore's count. 每次线程进入信号量时, 计数就会减少, 每次线程释放信号量时都会递增。The count is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented each time a thread releases the semaphore. 若要输入信号量, 线程将调用或重载之一。To enter the semaphore, a thread calls one of the or overloads. 若要释放信号量, 它将调用重载之一。To release the semaphore, it calls one of the overloads. 当计数达到零时, 对其中一种`Wait`方法的后续调用将会阻塞, 直到其他线程释放该信号量。When the count reaches zero, subsequent calls to one of the `Wait` methods block until other threads release the semaphore. 如果多个线程被阻止, 则不保证在线程进入信号量时控制的顺序, 如 FIFO 或 LIFO。If multiple threads are blocked, there is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, that controls when threads enter the semaphore. 使用信号灯保护资源的代码的基本结构是:The basic structure for code that uses a semaphore to protect resources is: ```vb ' Enter semaphore by calling one of the Wait or WaitAsync methods. SemaphoreSlim.Wait() ' ' Execute code protected by the semaphore. ' SemaphoreSlim.Release() ``` 当所有线程都已释放信号量后, 计数将达到创建信号量时指定的最大值。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 可以从属性获取信号量的计数。The semaphore's count is available from the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不会对、 和方法的调用强制执行线程或任务标识。 The class doesn't enforce thread or task identity on calls to the , , and methods. 此外, 如果使用构造函数实例化对象, 属性可能会超出构造函数设置的值。In addition, if the constructor is used to instantiate the object, the property can increase beyond the value set by the constructor. 编程人员应负责确保对或方法的调用与方法的调用正确配对。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that calls to or methods are appropriately paired with calls to methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个信号量, 其最大计数为三个线程, 初始计数为零个线程。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three threads and an initial count of zero threads. 该示例启动五个任务, 所有任务块会等待信号量。The example starts five tasks, all of which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程调用重载, 以将信号量计数增加到其最大值, 这允许三个任务进入信号量。The main thread calls the overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, which allows three tasks to enter the semaphore. 每次释放信号灯时, 都将显示以前的信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 对于每个线程, 会略微增加模拟的工作时间间隔, 使输出更易于读取。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread to make the output easier to read. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/vb/example.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护的成员都是线程安全的, 并且可以从多个线程并发使用, 但只有在上的所有其他操作都已完成时, 才必须使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must be used only when all other operations on the have completed.
Semaphore and SemaphoreSlim

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，以指定可同时授予的请求的初始数量。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of requests that can be granted concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `initialCount`参数定义输入可授予的信号量的并发请求数。The `initialCount` parameter defines the number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted. 但是, 它不定义可同时授予的请求的最大数量。However, it doesn't define the maximum number of requests that can be granted concurrently. 如果对`initialCount`方法的调用增加了属性的值, 则通过调用此构造函数实例化的对象不会引发异常。 A object instantiated by calling this constructor doesn't throw a exception if a call to the method increases the value of the property beyond `initialCount`. 如果对方法的调用多于或方法, 则会发生这种情况。This occurs if there are more calls to methods than there are to or methods. 若要设置最大并发请求数以输入可授予的信号量, 请调用构造函数。To set the maximum number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted, call the constructor.

span.span: is less than 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当必须使用相同的等待句柄等待 SemaphoreSlim 与其他基于内核的同步对象一起使用时, 才使用此属性。Use this property only when you must wait on a SemaphoreSlim together with other kernel-based synchronization objects with the same wait handle. 在上成功等待并不意味着成功等待自身, 也不会递减信号量的计数。A successful wait on the does not imply a successful wait on the itself, nor does it decrement the semaphore's count. 在可用的等待句柄终止后, 您应该具体等待。After the available wait handle is signaled, you should wait on the specifically.

span.span: The number of remaining threads that can enter the semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的初始值由对类构造函数的调用设置。The initial value of the property is set by the call to the class constructor. 它通过对或 方法的每次调用进行递减, 并在每次调用方法时递增。It is decremented by each call to the or method, and incremented by each call to the method.

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例使用的资源。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用`Dispose`后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Semaphore and SemaphoreSlim

summary.span: 阻止当前线程，直至它可进入 为止，同时使用 32 位带符号整数来指定超时。

returns.span: 如果当前线程成功进入 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current thread successfully entered the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超时设置为-1 毫秒, 则方法会无限期地等待。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果超时设置为零毫秒, 则方法不会阻止。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它将测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 如果线程或任务能够进入信号量, 则它会将属性减一。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果在调用时线程或任务被阻止, 并且由`millisecondsTimeout`指定的超时间隔过期:If a thread or task is blocked when calling and the timeout interval specified by `millisecondsTimeout` expires: - 线程或任务不输入信号量。The thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore. - 属性未减少。The property isn't decremented.

exception.span: 是 -1 之外的负数，表示无限超时或者超时大于 。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite timeout -or- timeout is greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果线程或任务能够进入信号量, 则它会将属性减一。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果`cancellationToken`取消, 则线程或任务不会进入信号量, 并且属性不会减少。If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, the thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore, and the property isn't decremented. 相反, 方法会引发异常。Instead, the method throws an exception.

Public Function WaitAsync (millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As Task(Of Boolean)

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 要等待的毫秒数，(-1) 表示无限等待，零表示测试等待句柄状态并立即返回。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, (-1) to wait indefinitely, or zero to test the state of the wait handle and return immediately.

summary.span: 输入 的异步等待，使用 32 位带符号整数度量时间间隔。

span.span: Asynchronously waits to enter the , using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the time interval.

returns.span: 如果当前线程成功输入了 ，则为将通过 的结果一起完成的任务，否则将通过 的结果完成。

span.span: A task that will complete with a result of if the current thread successfully entered the , otherwise with a result of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超时设置为-1 毫秒, 则方法会无限期地等待。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果超时设置为零毫秒, 则方法不会阻止。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它将测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately.

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 是 -1 之外的负数，表示无限超时或者超时大于 。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite timeout -or- timeout is greater than .
